properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 v4 c2 v5 c2 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh naadhu Yesu Raajaa Ninnu ne sthuthinchedhanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Varnincheda ne nee kriyalanu Smariyincheda nee manchi thanambun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshana geethamu ne paadedhanu Nishchaya jaya dhwani ne chesedhanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nireekshana poornatha galigi Parikincheda naa Prabhu raakadanu{/lang-eng}
